edited_stories.edited_story_text: We had so much time at our halloween party. I was dressed up as a movie star. My friend zeke was dressed as zorro. Tommy was a sheriff and of course, my friend sally had to copy me but she wanted to be a beauty queen. Even the kids were getting involved and dressed as robber.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: The party was lots of fun, and there were a lot of people there. Some of them were very good, but even though some were bad, everyone had a great time. Afterward we all got together and took pictures .
